item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Caltrain's Electric Fleet More Efficient Than Expected (164 points | 112 comments)
2. Kidnappers sever finger of cryptocurrency millionaire David Balland (69 points | 32 comments)
3. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (491 points | 105 comments)
4. You could have invented Fenwick trees (56 points | 13 comments)
5. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (122 points | 38 comments)
6. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (40 points | 6 comments)
7. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (135 points | 84 comments)
8. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (285 points | 123 comments)
9. Life Lessons from the First Half-Century of My Career (16 points | 2 comments)
10. Show HN: Onit – open-source ChatGPT Desktop with local mode, Claude, Gemini (84 points | 32 comments)
11. Android SMS Gateway Using MQTT (19 points | 2 comments)
12. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (236 points | 102 comments)
13. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (198 points | 44 comments)
14. Her dad, the 10k records he left behind and a viral lesson in grief (62 points | 30 comments)
15. Show HN: I recovered one of my earliest ZX-Spectrum games from an audio cassette (20 points | discuss)
16. The hidden complexity of scaling WebSockets (83 points | 21 comments)
17. Subpixel Snake [video] (199 points | 42 comments)
18. Anatomy of a Formal Proof (90 points | 2 comments)
19. Trying out Zed after more than a decade of Vim/Neovim (131 points | 82 comments)
20. Chatbox: Cross-platform desktop client for ChatGPT, Claude and other LLMs (31 points | 5 comments)
21. New book-sorting algorithm almost reaches perfection (179 points | 38 comments)
22. How I Use Home Assistant in 2025 (176 points | 178 comments)
23. Cytoskeleton-functionalized synthetic cells with life-like mechanical features (13 points | 1 comment)
24. A very Chicago gamble (114 points | 57 comments)
25. A WebAssembly compiler that fits in a tweet (198 points | 23 comments)
26. Ask HN: Why buy domains and 301 redirect them to me? (256 points | 85 comments)
27. Cloud Virtualization: Red Hat, AWS Firecracker, and Ubicloud internals (50 points | 9 comments)
28. VIC 20 Elite (49 points | 15 comments)
29. Converge (YC S23) is hiring engineer #2 in NYC ( | hide)
30. Frustrated YouTube viewers seek explanation for hour-long unskippable ads (36 points | 37 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
